md:
giải nghĩa từ "officials" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ đồng nghĩa.

1. Officials (n) - quan chức, viên chức

* Meaning: People who hold positions of authority or responsibility in an organization, government, or institution.

Example: The officials of the company were responsible for making important decisions.

Related words: bureaucrats, administrators, executives, authorities

Synonyms: functionaries, officeholders, dignitaries

2. Officials (n) - người có chức vụ, người có quyền hạn

* Meaning: People who are in charge of enforcing rules or laws.

Example: The officials at the stadium were responsible for ensuring that the game was played fairly.

Related words: referees, umpires, judges, inspectors

Synonyms: arbiters, moderators, regulators

Note: Depending on the context, "officials" can refer to either people in positions of authority or people who enforce rules or laws.
